Articles.Content:
Due to inconsistancies in the quality of our Kerbal's flight training, it has been determined that new training facilities must be created at once!

We've been trying to make one of these doohickeys.

and one of these Thing-a-ma-jiggers.

We have tried many designs, all of them horrible horrible failures. Am I crazy for thinking such things are possible in {stock} Kerbal at this stage of development?

Can any of YOU come up with a working, non-explodey version?
I made this but it only gets to 2.8g's.

TT modular wheels mod comes with a loose rotating thing, I made a doohickey that pulled about 5g's

Edited June 6, 2013 by duncan1297
